{"step_by_step_thinking": "Myofunctional appliance is typically given during the mixed dentition stage. This is because during this stage, the child has a combination of primary and permanent teeth. The purpose of a myofunctional appliance is to correct any abnormal oral habits and improve the function of the muscles and structures in the mouth. It is most effective when given during the mixed dentition stage when the child's jaw and teeth are still developing.", "answer_choice": "B. Mixed dentition"}
